definition: Serbia/Serbian/abbr. for 塞爾維亞|塞尔维亚[Sai1 er3 wei2 ya4]
to stop up/to squeeze in/to stuff/cork/stopper
to stop up/to stuff/to cope with

sentences.english: Results The blood supply of uterine myoma was occluded while both uterine arteries were embolized.
sentences.chinese: 结果栓塞双侧子宫动脉后，子宫肌瘤血供可完全阻断。

sentences.english: Splenic embolization in treatment of hypersplenism using both silk threads and gelfoam.
sentences.chinese: 丝线加明胶海绵脾脏栓塞治疗脾功能亢进。

sentences.english: Twenty weeks later the researchers again measured plaque in the mouse aortas.
sentences.chinese: 二十周之后，研究人员重新测量老鼠动脉上的栓塞。

sentences.english: The long-term success of embolization is unpredictable.
sentences.chinese: 栓塞的长期成功性是不确切的。

sentences.english: Pulmonary embolism 2010 - what is really new?
sentences.chinese: 肺血栓栓塞症2010，真正的进展是什么？

sentences.english: In this paper, we set forth the application of grouting in complete strong weathering rock body to the new grouting plug, its structure and working principle.
sentences.chinese: 本文介绍全强风化岩体中灌浆时应用的新型灌浆栓塞。

sentences.english: Conclusions Establishment of cerebral infarction model by gelfoam embolization is practical.
sentences.chinese: 结论用明胶海绵栓塞颈内动脉制作脑梗塞模型可行。

sentences.english: Objective To evaluate the mid-long term effects of uterine fibroids embolization.
sentences.chinese: 目的评价子宫肌瘤栓塞治疗的中长期疗效。

sentences.english: No wound infection or pulmonary embolism were found. 2 cases got involved with urinary tract infection.
sentences.chinese: 无切口感染及肺栓塞发生，2例出现尿道感染。

sentences.english: Methods There were 15 cases of cerebral embolism performed thrombolytic therapy by intervention.
sentences.chinese: 方法对15例脑栓塞患者进行介入性动脉内溶栓治疗。

sentences.english: Treatment with coil is simple and have favourable prognosis.
sentences.chinese: 使用弹簧圈栓塞材料操作简单，预后好。

sentences.english: Objective To investigate the diagnosis and embolization therapy of the uterine arteriovenous malformation.
sentences.chinese: 目的探讨子宫动静脉瘘的诊断和栓塞治疗的价值。

sentences.english: Brain embolism was the most frequent cause in large cerebral infarction.
sentences.chinese: 结论脑栓塞是大面积脑梗死的主要原因。

sentences.english: Conclusion This method was practical, safe and effective for cerebral embolism.
sentences.chinese: 结论该方法用于脑栓塞治疗可行，有效，安全。

sentences.english: The APTE model was established by injection of thrombus made in vitro through jugular vein.
sentences.chinese: 经颈静脉加压注入体外血栓制成急性肺血栓栓塞模型。

sentences.english: The maintenance of higher aortic perfusion pressure intraoperatively must be emphasized to decrease the likelihood of air embolism.
sentences.chinese: 应强调术中保持较高的主动脉灌注压以防止空气栓塞。

definition: hematoma/swelling of soft tissue due to internal hemorrhage
